channel.title: Help adding npcs
channel.description: hello everyone, first i have to say im not good at this ok.. i only made my first server 2 days ago (hiyascape v1) ok, i was wondering if there was like a tut for addin npcs and stuff or could someone like go on my server and help me add npcs.. it has 2 ips first one is :piepiepie.no-ip.org, second one is: fastforwardrules.no-ip.biz thanks!

item.title: Help adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

ok i have mine based off hiyascape v1 also
the format of it in autospawn.cfg is

spawn = 1835	2899	3509	0	0	0	0	0	2	bunny

spawn = 1835 is npc number 1835
2899 is x coord
3509 is y coord
last thing is description

Read full topic
